channel.title: Full On Help Needed Here :)
channel.description:
So..
I've been playing on many servers for a while now passing from server to server and want to start my own. And tbh i dont know much about the making or running of servers. so i want some basic help on how to find, edit (simple stuff), and run my own server. any helpfull links and information will be great.
stuff i know i definatly need help on : Port Forwarding - Linksys . WRT54GS Editing - Making Staff Members Making Commands Changing Teleport Spots Changing Exp Rates Changing Drops,Monsters location. How to stop spammers ( people who I ip ban but still return )
Thanks for your time and help
I B

item.title: Full On Help Needed Here :)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Editing - Making Staff Members - Character folder, click on the name, set playerRights to 1, 2, or 3
Making Commands - Look at others in your client.java
Changing Teleport Spots - Search for the coords
Changing Exp Rates - search for (double) and look at it
Changing Drops,Monsters location. - autospawn.cfg and item2.java

Read full topic

item.title: Full On Help Needed Here :)
item.dc:creator: @i_b_laggin i b laggin
item.description:
@i_b_laggin wrote:

Thanks for the help i will have a play about with it in a bit

Any extra information will be gratefull

I B

Read full topic

item.title: Full On Help Needed Here :)
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

Port forwarding - http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Linksys/FON-WRT54GL/FON-WRT54GLindex.htm
just click any program but instead of forwarding the ports it says forward port 43594 and its TCP.

Server guide - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html

Most servers have a config file and in it is a text file called administrators and one moderators. To make someone admin for example just put there name in the mod file on a new line.

Um yeh just look through tutorials and learn…

Read full topic
